content:
She never doubts herself and she never gives up on others. 

 Her ability to stay hopeful even when things are at their worst is why she's unstoppable.

Her cheerful personality has that ability to make anyone happy. 

 She always tries to find something positive in any situation and that reflects positively on her personality.
Her tears are a form of release as they flow through the inner conflicts she harbour.

She has such a fun personality and the fact that she's so young means that she is still full of surprises and happy energy. 

 May her child-like innocence never be lost.
Her dedication to others is truly phenomenal, we are so lucky she's in our lives.

The warmth of her smile brightens up anyone's day. 

 It's hard to resist this woman's generous smile.

She is a lady that has a lot of charm and knows how to melt even the coldest of hearts. 

 She is always smiling, kind and friendly at all times.
She has the ability to overcome negative thoughts as soon as they appear.
Being happy for her own success is good but being happy for the triumphs of others makes her remarkable.
Her encouragement, or even anger, at the things you're not doing well enough for yourself is something we all need.

Her feedback is always useful, whether it's positive or negative. 

 She always intends to help you improve yourself.

I can't get over how amazing you are. 

 I love how you always surprise me with how awesome you are.
